boardgame.description: Dead Man's Draw is a simple and strategic card game of risk and reward for 2 to 4 players. Players take turns drawing cards and combining their special abilities to plunder the most loot without busting their entire hands._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The core of your turn in Dead Man_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Draw is all in the flip: pulling the top card off the deck and using its special ability. Your turn isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t over until you say it is, though. You can keep pulling cards as long as you like _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; until you play a card of a suit already seen, at which point you lose everything. Knowing when to stop and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;bank_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; your cards is the biggest decision you make in Dead Man_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Draw, but being too timid lets braver opponents pass you up with bigger, more profitable turns._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; special abilities are key to success in Dead Man_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Draw, and they build off of each other. Each suit in DMD has an effect that the player can target when they flip a card of that suit._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Anchor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Keep everything you drew before the Anchor even if you bust._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Cannon _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Destroy one card an opponent has previously banked._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Chest _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Double your haul by banking as many cards directly from the discard pile as are in the river when you bank the Chest _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but only if you also bank a Key._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Hook _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Play one of your previously banked cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Key _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Enables the Chest special._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Kraken _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Oh no! You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re forced to draw at least two more cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Map _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Draw three cards from the discard pile and play one._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mermaid _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; No ability, but worth more points (Mermaids are numbered 4-9 instead of 2-7)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Oracle _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Look at the next card before deciding if you want to play it._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Sword _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Steal an opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s previously banked card and play it._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Many of these work well together, like using a Hook to re-play a Sword from your hand to steal an opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Chest to go with your Key _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; racking up huge points by playing abilities well and not solely through the luck of the draw._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As soon as the deck is depleted, players total up the value of the highest card they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ve banked from each suit. High score wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Mayday Games (MYY4316) In Dead Man_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Draw press your luck as a pirate trying to amass the most loot. But here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the catch, get too greedy, and you could lose it all. Dead Man_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Draw is played by 2-4 pirates in about 10-15 minutes. Draw cards one at a time trying to collect the most loot, comprised of ten suits with six cards in each. Draw different suits and your treasure grows, but get two of the same suit, you bust and your turn is over.

Draw different suits and your treasure grows, but get two of the same suit, you bust and your turn is over.

MAYDAY GAMES (MYY4302) The original game is already a hit but this game is truly unique because of the new art, amazing tin box presentation and new theme. The main difference in terms of game play is in the Trait Cards, rather than having icons to represent each ability on the Trait Cards, the abilities are printed right on the cards for easy reference during game play. No other changes to the actual game play were made, so if you love the original you are sure to love this version too!
